page.title: 12Law and Order
page.content: Law and order in our area is maintained by our local policeman ,who is a member of the Gwent Constabulary. He is the village Bobby.His duty area covers the whole of Cwmfelinfach and Ynysddu and the mountainsides around them including fifteen farms. The police station is situated in the main street of Cwmfelin,it is only a village station manned for a few hours a day by P.C.Thomas.Each day he is on duty he must report to his headquarters at Blackwood 3km. away. P.C.Thomas patrols the village on a cycle and also on foot.His daily rounds involve taking statements, checking all the buildings for signs of vandalism or break in.He is often approached by people who tell him any problems they might have.The most recent serious case he has been involved with was a fatal car crash.
